question: Which Indian state/UT has approved to constitute its own school education board?
explanation:
The Delhi Cabinet gave approval to the constitution of Delhi’s own school education board.
As per the Delhi CM Arvind Kejriwal, 20-25 schools will be included in the ‘Delhi Board of School Education’, in the academic session 2021-22. There are around 1,000 government schools and 1,700 private schools in Delhi.
